item.title: 3D Modeling
item.description: /c/3D Modeling on lemmy.graphics https://lemmy.graphics/c/3dmodeling Description A community for 3D modelers of all kinds! Share your favorite tips and tricks for Maya, 3DS Max, Blender, Houdini, and more. item.title: Nuke
item.description: /c/Nuke on lemmy.graphics https://lemmy.graphics/c/nukevfx Description This is an unofficial community for Nuke compositors to share tips, tricks, and inspiration with each other. Nuke is a nodal compositing software commonly used in feature film and commercials, developed by The Foundry. Looking for a more general compositing community? Check out [c/compositing](lemmy.graphics/c/compositing)! Details * Subscribers 3 Posts 1 Comments 0 Daily Active Users 1 Weekly Active Users 1 Monthly Active Users 1 Published 2023-06-12 20:16:10 Updated 2023-06-13 03:12:24 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:25
